name: Garden Oasis
description: A serene garden oasis with blooming flowers and tranquil ponds, offering a peaceful atmosphere for outdoor weddings.

name: Mountain Lodge
description: A cozy mountain lodge nestled in the heart of the wilderness, providing a rustic and charming setting for mountain weddings.

name: Urban Loft
description: A trendy urban loft featuring industrial-chic decor and panoramic city views, perfect for modern and stylish weddings.

name: Vineyard Estate
description: A picturesque vineyard estate surrounded by rolling hills and vineyards, offering a romantic and elegant backdrop for wine-themed weddings.

name: Tropical Paradise
description: A tropical paradise resort with palm-fringed beaches, lush gardens, and crystal-clear waters, creating an idyllic setting for beach weddings.
